                                                            # [2]OrderClientServlet.checkout()
                                                            protected void checkout(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    // 1.è·å–HttpSessionå¯¹è±¡
    HttpSession session = request.getSession();

    // 2.è·å–è´­ç‰©è½¦å¯¹è±¡
    Cart cart = (Cart) session.getAttribute("cart");
    if (cart == null) {
        String viewName = "cart/cart";

        processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

        return ;
    }

    // 3.è·å–å·²ç™»å½•çš„ç”¨æˆ·å¯¹è±¡
    User user = (User) session.getAttribute("user");

    // 4.è°ƒç”¨Serviceæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œç»“è´¦çš„ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘
    String orderSequence = orderService.checkout(cart, user);

    // 5.æ¸…ç©ºè´­ç‰©è½¦
    session.removeAttribute("cart");

    // 6.å°†è®¢å•å·å­˜å…¥è¯·æ±‚åŸŸ
    request.setAttribute("orderSequence", orderSequence);

    // 7.å°†é¡µé¢è·³è½¬åˆ°ä¸‹å•æˆåŠŸé¡µé¢
    String viewName = "cart/checkout";
    processTemplate(viewName, request, response);
}
                                                            # [3]OrderService.checkout()
                                                            @Override
public String checkout(Cart cart, User user) {

    // ä»Userå¯¹è±¡ä¸­è·å–userId
    Integer userId = user.getUserId();

    // åˆ›å»ºè®¢å•å¯¹è±¡
    Order order = new Order();

    // ç»™è®¢å•å¯¹è±¡å¡«å……æ•°æ®
    // ç”Ÿæˆè®¢å•å·=ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¶é—´æˆ³
    String orderSequence = System.currentTimeMillis() + "_" + userId;

    // ç”Ÿæˆè®¢å•çš„æ—¶é—´
    SimpleDateFormat simpleDateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss");
    String createTime = simpleDateFormat.format(new Date());

    // ä»è´­ç‰©è½¦è¿ç§»æ€»æ•°é‡å’Œæ€»é‡‘é¢
    Integer totalCount = cart.getTotalCount();
    Double totalAmount = cart.getTotalAmount();

    order.setOrderSequence(orderSequence);
    order.setCreateTime(createTime);
    order.setTotalCount(totalCount);
    order.setTotalAmount(totalAmount);

    // å°†è®¢å•å¯¹è±¡ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
    // â€»è¯´æ˜ï¼šè¿™é‡Œå¯¹insertOrder()æ–¹æ³•çš„è¦æ±‚æ˜¯è·å–è‡ªå¢çš„ä¸»é”®å¹¶å°†è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„å€¼è®¾ç½®åˆ°Orderå¯¹è±¡çš„orderIdå±æ€§ä¸­
    orderDao.insertOrder(order);

    // è·å–è®¢å•å¯¹è±¡åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„å€¼
    Integer orderId = order.getOrderId();

    // æ ¹æ®è´­ç‰©è½¦ä¸­çš„CartItemé›†åˆé€ä¸ªåˆ›å»ºOrderItemå¯¹è±¡
    Map<String, CartItem> cartItemMap = cart.getCartItemMap();
    Collection<CartItem> cartItems = cartItemMap.values();
    List<CartItem> cartItemList = new ArrayList<>(cartItems);

    // ä¸ºäº†ä¾¿äºæ‰¹é‡ä¿å­˜OrderItemï¼Œåˆ›å»ºObject[][]
    // äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ç¬¬ä¸€ç»´ï¼šSQLè¯­å¥çš„æ•°é‡
    // äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ç¬¬äºŒç»´ï¼šSQLè¯­å¥ä¸­å‚æ•°çš„æ•°é‡
    Object[][] saveOrderItemParamArr = new Object[cartItems.size()][6];

    // ä¸ºäº†ä¾¿äºæ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°Bookï¼Œåˆ›å»ºObject[][]
    Object[][] updateBookParamArr = new Object[cartItems.size()][3];

    for (int i = 0;i < cartItemList.size(); i++) {

        CartItem cartItem = cartItemList.get(i);

        // ä¸ºä¿å­˜OrderItemåˆ›å»ºObject[]
        Object[] orderItemParam = new Object[6];

        // book_name,price,img_path,item_count,item_amount,order_id
        orderItemParam[0] = cartItem.getBookName();
        orderItemParam[1] = cartItem.getPrice();
        orderItemParam[2] = cartItem.getImgPath();
        orderItemParam[3] = cartItem.getCount();
        orderItemParam[4] = cartItem.getAmount();
        orderItemParam[5] = orderId;

        // å°†ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„å­˜å…¥äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ä¸­
        saveOrderItemParamArr[i] = orderItemParam;

        // åˆ›å»ºæ•°ç»„ç”¨äºä¿å­˜æ›´æ–°Bookæ•°æ®çš„ä¿¡æ¯
        String[] bookUpdateInfoArr = new String[3];

        // å¢åŠ çš„é”€é‡
        bookUpdateInfoArr[0] = cartItem.getCount() + "";

        // å‡å°‘çš„åº“å­˜
        bookUpdateInfoArr[1] = cartItem.getCount() + "";

        // bookId
        bookUpdateInfoArr[2] = cartItem.getBookId();

        // å°†æ•°ç»„å­˜å…¥Listé›†åˆ
        updateBookParamArr[i] = bookUpdateInfoArr;
    }

    // æŠŠOrderItemå¯¹è±¡çš„é›†åˆä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ï¼šæ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œ
    orderItemDao.insertOrderItemArr(saveOrderItemParamArr);

    // ä½¿ç”¨bookUpdateInfoListå¯¹å›¾ä¹¦æ•°æ®çš„è¡¨æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°æ“ä½œ
    bookDao.updateBookByParamArr(updateBookParamArr);

    // è¿”å›è®¢å•å·
    return orderSequence;
}
                                                            # [4]orderDao.insertOrder(order)
                                                            @Override
public void insertOrder(Order order) {

    // â€»DBUtilsæ²¡æœ‰å°è£…è·å–è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œéœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿçš„JDBCæ¥å®Œæˆ
    // 1.è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
    Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

    // 2.åˆ›å»ºPreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
    String sql = "INSERT INTO t_order(order_sequence,create_time,total_count,total_amount,order_status,user_id) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)";

    try {

        // â‘ åˆ›å»ºPreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒæŒ‡æ˜éœ€è¦è‡ªå¢çš„ä¸»é”®
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql, PreparedStatement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS);

        // â‘¡ç»™PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡è®¾ç½®SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°
        preparedStatement.setString(1, order.getOrderSequence());
        preparedStatement.setString(2, order.getCreateTime());
        preparedStatement.setInt(3, order.getTotalCount());
        preparedStatement.setDouble(4, order.getTotalAmount());
        preparedStatement.setInt(5, order.getOrderStatus());
        preparedStatement.setInt(6, order.getUserId());

        // â‘¢æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°
        preparedStatement.executeUpdate();

        // â‘£è·å–å°è£…äº†è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„ç»“æœé›†
        ResultSet generatedKeysResultSet = preparedStatement.getGeneratedKeys();

        // â‘¤è§£æç»“æœé›†
        if (generatedKeysResultSet.next()) {
            int orderId = generatedKeysResultSet.getInt(1);

            order.setOrderId(orderId);
        }

    } catch (SQLException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        throw new RuntimeException(e);
    } finally {
        JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);
    }

}
                                                            # [5]BaseDao.batchUpdate()
                                                            /**
 * é€šç”¨çš„æ‰¹é‡å¢åˆ æ”¹æ–¹æ³•
 * @param sql
 * @param params æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œçš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
 *               æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„
 *               å¤šæ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°å°±æ˜¯äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
 * @return æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥è¿”å›çš„å—å½±å“çš„è¡Œæ•°
 */
public int[] batchUpdate(String sql, Object[][] params) {

    Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

    int[] rowCountArr = null;

    try {
        rowCountArr = queryRunner.batch(connection, sql, params);
    } catch (SQLException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        throw new RuntimeException(e);
    } finally {
        JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);
    }

    return rowCountArr;

}

                                                            public void doFilter(ServletRequest req, ServletResponse resp, FilterChain chain) throws ServletException, IOException {

    try{

        // å…³é—­äº‹åŠ¡çš„è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
        connection.setAutoCommit(false);

        // ã€äº‹åŠ¡ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œã€å°±åœ¨chain.doFilter(req, resp);å°†æ¥è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸­
        // æ‰€ä»¥ç”¨äº‹åŠ¡çš„try...catch...finallyå—åŒ…ä½chain.doFilter(req, resp);
        // å°±èƒ½è®©æ‰€æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡æ–¹æ³•éƒ½ã€äº«å—ã€åˆ°äº‹åŠ¡åŠŸèƒ½çš„ã€æœåŠ¡ã€ã€‚
        // æ‰€è°“æ¡†æ¶å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æŠŠå¸¸ç”¨çš„ã€å¥—è·¯ä»£ç ã€æŠ½å–å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œä¸ºå¤§å®¶æœåŠ¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬äº«å—æ¡†æ¶æœåŠ¡æé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ã€‚
        chain.doFilter(req, resp);

        // æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡
        connection.commit();
    }catch(Excetion e){

        // å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡
        connection.rollBack();

    }finally{

        // é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        connection.close();

    }

}

                                                            # â‘¤åœ¨Filterä¸­è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥

                                                            public void doFilter(ServletRequest req, ServletResponse resp, FilterChain chain) throws ServletException, IOException {

    try{

        // è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        // å…³é—­äº‹åŠ¡çš„è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
        connection.setAutoCommit(false);

        // ã€äº‹åŠ¡ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œã€å°±åœ¨chain.doFilter(req, resp);å°†æ¥è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸­
        // æ‰€ä»¥ç”¨äº‹åŠ¡çš„try...catch...finallyå—åŒ…ä½chain.doFilter(req, resp);
        // å°±èƒ½è®©æ‰€æœ‰äº‹åŠ¡æ–¹æ³•éƒ½ã€äº«å—ã€åˆ°äº‹åŠ¡åŠŸèƒ½çš„ã€æœåŠ¡ã€ã€‚
        // æ‰€è°“æ¡†æ¶å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æŠŠå¸¸ç”¨çš„ã€å¥—è·¯ä»£ç ã€æŠ½å–å‡ºæ¥ï¼Œä¸ºå¤§å®¶æœåŠ¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬äº«å—æ¡†æ¶æœåŠ¡æé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ã€‚
        chain.doFilter(req, resp);

        // æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡
        connection.commit();
    }catch(Excetion e){

        // å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡
        connection.rollBack();

    }finally{

        // é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        connection.close();

    }

}

                                                            # â‘¥ä¿è¯æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªè¿æ¥

                                                            ã€é‡è¦å‘ç°ã€ï¼šåœ¨ä¹¦åŸé¡¹ç›®ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰æ‰§è¡ŒSQLè¯­å¥çš„ä»£ç éƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡**JDBCUtils.getConnection()æ–¹æ³•è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é‡æ„JDBCUtils.getConnection()**æ–¹æ³•å®ç°ï¼šæ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªè¿æ¥ã€‚

                                                            ä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯å„ä¸ªéœ€è¦Connectionå¯¹è±¡çš„åœ°æ–¹ä½¿ç”¨çš„éƒ½æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä»æ•°æ®æºä¸­åªè·å–ä¸€ä¸ªConnectionã€‚ä¸æ˜¯è¯´æ•´ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®åªç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªConnectionï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯è¯´è°ƒç”¨JDBCUtils.getConnection()æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œåªä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è½å®åˆ°ä»£ç ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯ï¼šæ¯æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨getConnection()æ–¹æ³•æ—¶å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å·²ç»æ‹¿è¿‡äº†ï¼Œæ‹¿è¿‡å°±ç»™æ—§çš„ï¼Œæ²¡æ‹¿è¿‡ç»™æ–°çš„ã€‚

                                                            ä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯å„ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¸­éœ€è¦Connectionå¯¹è±¡æ—¶éƒ½èƒ½æ‹¿åˆ°åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦åšåˆ°ï¼šå°†å”¯ä¸€çš„å¯¹è±¡å­˜å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§å®¶éƒ½èƒ½æ¥è§¦åˆ°çš„åœ°æ–¹ã€‚

                                                            # â‘¦çº¿ç¨‹æœ¬åœ°åŒ–

                                                            # [1]ç¡®è®¤åŒä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹

                                                            åœ¨ä»Filterã€Servletã€Serviceä¸€ç›´åˆ°Daoè¿è¡Œçš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å§‹ç»ˆéƒ½æ²¡æœ‰åšç±»ä¼¼new Thread().start()è¿™æ ·å¼€å¯æ–°çº¿ç¨‹çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ•´ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ä¸­ã€‚

                                                            # [2]ä¸€æ¡å°æ²³

                                                            # [3]ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹

                                                            # [4]ä»£ç 

                                                            java.lang.ThreadLocalçš„set()æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                                                public void set(T value) {
        Thread t = Thread.currentThread();
        ThreadLocalMap map = getMap(t);
        if (map != null)
            map.set(this, value);
        else
            createMap(t, value);
    }

                                                            java.lang.TheadLocalçš„get()æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                                                public T get() {
        Thread t = Thread.currentThread();
        ThreadLocalMap map = getMap(t);
        if (map != null) {
            ThreadLocalMap.Entry e = map.getEntry(this);
            if (e != null) {
                @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
                T result = (T)e.value;
                return result;
            }
        }
        return setInitialValue();
    }

                                                            æ‰€ä»¥TheadLocalçš„åŸºæœ¬åŸç†æ˜¯ï¼šå®ƒåœ¨å†…éƒ¨ç»´æŠ¤äº†ä¸€ä¸ªMapï¼Œéœ€è¦å­˜å…¥æ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œå°±ä»¥thisä¸ºé”®ï¼Œè¦å­˜å…¥çš„æ•°æ®ä¸ºå€¼ï¼Œå­˜å…¥Mapã€‚éœ€è¦å–å‡ºæ•°æ®æ—¶ï¼Œå°±ä»¥thisä¸ºé”®ï¼Œä»Mapä¸­å–å‡ºæ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                            # [5]ç»“è®º

                                                            å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å°†æ•°æ®åœ¨æ•´ä¸ªé¡¹ç›®ä¸­æŒ‰ç…§ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹çš„æ–¹å¼ä¼ é€’ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åˆæ²¡æ³•é€šè¿‡æ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹æœ¬åœ°åŒ–æŠ€æœ¯æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéå¸¸å¥½çš„é€‰æ‹©ã€‚

                                                            # â‘§å¼‚å¸¸å‘ä¸ŠæŠ›å‡ºçš„çº¿è·¯

                                                            ä¸Šå›¾ä¸­æ ‡è®°é¢œè‰²çš„ä½ç½®éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‰try...catchå—çš„ä»£ç ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€ä¸ªæ£€æŸ¥ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œcatchå—æ•è·çš„å¼‚å¸¸æ˜¯å¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºè¿è¡Œæ—¶å¼‚å¸¸åˆå†æ¬¡æŠ›å‡ºã€‚

                                                            å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŠ›å‡ºï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸å°±ä¸ä¼šä¼ é€’åˆ°Filterä¸­ï¼ŒTransactionFilterå°±ä¼šè®¤ä¸ºä»£ç æ‰§è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç”Ÿé—®é¢˜ï¼Œä»è€Œæäº¤äº‹åŠ¡ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®é™…ä¸Šåº”è¯¥å›æ»šã€‚ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ï¼š

                                                            /**
 * é€šç”¨çš„æ‰¹é‡å¢åˆ æ”¹æ–¹æ³•
 * @param sql
 * @param params æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œçš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
 *               æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„
 *               å¤šæ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°å°±æ˜¯äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
 * @return æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥è¿”å›çš„å—å½±å“çš„è¡Œæ•°
 */
public int[] batchUpdate(String sql, Object[][] params) {

    Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

    int[] rowCountArr = null;

    try {
        rowCountArr = queryRunner.batch(connection, sql, params);
    } catch (SQLException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        throw new RuntimeException(e);
    } finally {
        JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);
    }

    return rowCountArr;

}

                                                            # 4ã€ä»£ç å®ç°

                                                            # â‘ é‡æ„JDBCUtilsç±»

                                                            • è¦ç‚¹1ï¼šå°†ThreadLocalå¯¹è±¡å£°æ˜ä¸ºé™æ€æˆå‘˜å˜é‡
                                                            • è¦ç‚¹2ï¼šé‡æ„è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„æ–¹æ³•
                                                            • è¦ç‚¹3ï¼šé‡æ„é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„æ–¹æ³•
                                                            /**
 * åŠŸèƒ½1ï¼šåˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡
 * åŠŸèƒ½2ï¼šè·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¹¶ç»‘å®šåˆ°å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ä¸Š
 * åŠŸèƒ½3ï¼šé‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¹¶ä»å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ç§»é™¤
 */
public class JDBCUtils {

    // å°†æ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡è®¾ç½®ä¸ºé™æ€å±æ€§ï¼Œä¿è¯å¤§å¯¹è±¡çš„å•ä¸€å®ä¾‹
    private static DataSource dataSource;

    // å°†ThreadLocalå¯¹è±¡è®¾ç½®ä¸ºé™æ€æˆå‘˜å˜é‡ï¼Œä¿è¯ä»¥æ­¤ä¸ºé”®æ—¶ä»Mapä¸­å–å€¼èƒ½å¤Ÿå–åˆ°åŒä¸€ä¸ªå€¼
    private static ThreadLocal<Connection> threadLocal = new ThreadLocal<>();

    static {

        // 1.åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å¤–éƒ¨å±æ€§æ–‡ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯çš„Propertieså¯¹è±¡
        Properties properties = new Properties();

        // 2.ä½¿ç”¨å½“å‰ç±»çš„ç±»åŠ è½½å™¨åŠ è½½å¤–éƒ¨å±æ€§æ–‡ä»¶ï¼šjdbc.properties
        InputStream inputStream = JDBCUtils.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("jdbc.properties");

        try {

            // 3.å°†å¤–éƒ¨å±æ€§æ–‡ä»¶jdbc.propertiesä¸­çš„æ•°æ®åŠ è½½åˆ°propertieså¯¹è±¡ä¸­
            properties.load(inputStream);

            // 4.åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®æºå¯¹è±¡
            dataSource = DruidDataSourceFactory.createDataSource(properties);

        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

    }

    /**
     * ä»æ•°æ®æºä¸­è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
     * @return æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static Connection getConnection() {

        // 1.å°è¯•ä»å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è·å–Connectionå¯¹è±¡
        Connection connection = threadLocal.get();

        if (connection == null) {

            try {
                // 2.å¦‚æœä»å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ä¸Šæ²¡æœ‰è·å–åˆ°Connectionå¯¹è±¡é‚£ä¹ˆä»æ•°æ®æºè·å–
                connection = dataSource.getConnection();

                // 3.å°†Connectionå¯¹è±¡ç»‘å®šåˆ°å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹
                threadLocal.set(connection);

            } catch (SQLException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();

                throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }

        }

        // 4.è¿”å›Connectionå¯¹è±¡
        return connection;

    }

    /**
     * é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
     * @param connection è¦æ‰§è¡Œé‡Šæ”¾æ“ä½œçš„è¿æ¥å¯¹è±¡
     */
    public static void releaseConnection(Connection connection) {

        if (connection != null) {

            try {
                connection.close();

                // å°†Connectionå¯¹è±¡ä»å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ç§»é™¤
                threadLocal.remove();

            } catch (SQLException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();

                throw new RuntimeException(e);
            }

        }

    }
}

                                                            # â‘¡é‡æ„BaseDao

                                                            • è¦ç‚¹ï¼šå»é™¤é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„æ“ä½œï¼ˆè½¬ç§»åˆ°TransactionFilterä¸­ï¼‰
                                                            /**
 * å„ä¸ªå…·ä½“Daoç±»çš„åŸºç±»ï¼Œæ³›å‹Tå¯¹åº”å…·ä½“å®ä½“ç±»ç±»å‹
 * @param <T>
 */
public class BaseDao<T> {

    private QueryRunner queryRunner = new QueryRunner();

    /**
     * é€šç”¨çš„æ‰¹é‡å¢åˆ æ”¹æ–¹æ³•
     * @param sql
     * @param params æ‰§è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œçš„äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
     *               æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„
     *               å¤šæ¡SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°å°±æ˜¯äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„
     * @return æ¯ä¸€æ¡SQLè¯­å¥è¿”å›çš„å—å½±å“çš„è¡Œæ•°
     */
    public int[] batchUpdate(String sql, Object[][] params) {

        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        int[] rowCountArr = null;

        try {
            rowCountArr = queryRunner.batch(connection, sql, params);
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();

            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }/* finally {
            JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);
        }*/

        return rowCountArr;

    }

    /**
     * é€šç”¨çš„å¢åˆ æ”¹æ–¹æ³•
     * @param sql è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„SQLè¯­å¥
     * @param param ä¸ºSQLè¯­å¥å‡†å¤‡å¥½çš„å‚æ•°
     * @return å—å½±å“çš„è¡Œæ•°
     */
    public int update(String sql, Object ... param) {

        int updatedRowCount = 0;

        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        try {

            updatedRowCount = queryRunner.update(connection, sql, param);

        }
        // ä¸ºäº†è®©ä¸Šå±‚æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œå°†ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶å¼‚å¸¸æ•è·
        catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();

            // ä¸ºäº†ä¸æ©ç›–é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå°†ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶å¼‚å¸¸å°è£…ä¸ºè¿è¡Œæ—¶å¼‚å¸¸æŠ›å‡º
            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }/* finally {

            // å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
            JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);

        }*/

        return updatedRowCount;

    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
     * @param clazz å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„å®ä½“ç±»ç±»å‹
     * @param sql   æŸ¥è¯¢å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„SQLè¯­å¥
     * @param param SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°
     * @return      æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public T getBean(Class<T> clazz, String sql, Object ... param) {

        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        T t = null;

        try {

            t = queryRunner.query(connection, sql, new BeanHandler<>(clazz), param);
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();

            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }/* finally {

            // å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
            JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);

        }*/

        return t;
    }

    /**
     * æŸ¥è¯¢é›†åˆå¯¹è±¡
     * @param clazz é›†åˆä¸­å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„å®ä½“ç±»ç±»å‹
     * @param sql   æŸ¥è¯¢é›†åˆæ‰€éœ€è¦çš„SQLè¯­å¥
     * @param param SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°
     * @return      æŸ¥è¯¢åˆ°çš„é›†åˆå¯¹è±¡
     */
    public List<T> getBeanList(Class<T> clazz, String sql, Object ... param) {

        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        List<T> list = null;

        try {

            list = queryRunner.query(connection, sql, new BeanListHandler<>(clazz), param);
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();

            throw new RuntimeException(e);
        }/* finally {

            // å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
            JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);

        }*/

        return list;
    }

}

                                                            æ³¨æ„ï¼šOrderDaoä¸­insertOrder()æ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿè¦å»æ‰å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥çš„æ“ä½œã€‚

                                                            @Override
public void insertOrder(Order order) {

    // â€»DBUtilsæ²¡æœ‰å°è£…è·å–è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œéœ€è¦æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨åŸç”Ÿçš„JDBCæ¥å®Œæˆ
    // 1.è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
    Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

    // 2.åˆ›å»ºPreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡
    String sql = "INS222ERT INTO t_order(order_sequence,create_time,total_count,total_amount,order_status,user_id) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?)";

    try {

        // â‘ åˆ›å»ºPreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡ï¼ŒæŒ‡æ˜éœ€è¦è‡ªå¢çš„ä¸»é”®
        PreparedStatement preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql, PreparedStatement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS);

        // â‘¡ç»™PreparedStatementå¯¹è±¡è®¾ç½®SQLè¯­å¥çš„å‚æ•°
        preparedStatement.setString(1, order.getOrderSequence());
        preparedStatement.setString(2, order.getCreateTime());
        preparedStatement.setInt(3, order.getTotalCount());
        preparedStatement.setDouble(4, order.getTotalAmount());
        preparedStatement.setInt(5, order.getOrderStatus());
        preparedStatement.setInt(6, order.getUserId());

        // â‘¢æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°
        preparedStatement.executeUpdate();

        // â‘£è·å–å°è£…äº†è‡ªå¢ä¸»é”®çš„ç»“æœé›†
        ResultSet generatedKeysResultSet = preparedStatement.getGeneratedKeys();

        // â‘¤è§£æç»“æœé›†
        if (generatedKeysResultSet.next()) {
            int orderId = generatedKeysResultSet.getInt(1);

            order.setOrderId(orderId);
        }

    } catch (SQLException e) {
        e.printStackTrace();

        throw new RuntimeException(e);
    } /*finally {
        JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);
    }*/

}

                                                            # â‘¢åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºæ˜¾ç¤ºé€šç”¨é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯çš„é¡µé¢

                                                            # [1]åˆ›å»ºé¡µé¢

                                                            è¿™ä¸ªé¡µé¢å¯ä»¥ä»login_success.htmlå¤åˆ¶è¿‡æ¥

                                                            # [2]åˆ›å»ºServletè·³è½¬åˆ°é¡µé¢

                                                            protected void showSystemError(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {

    String viewName = "error";

    processTemplate(viewName, request, response);

}

                                                            # â‘£åˆ›å»ºTransactionFilter

                                                            <filter>
    <filter-name>TransactionFilter</filter-name>
    <filter-class>com.atguigu.bookstore.filter.TransactionFilter</filter-class>
</filter>
<filter-mapping>
    <filter-name>TransactionFilter</filter-name>
    <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern>
</filter-mapping>

                                                            Javaä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                                            public class TransactionFilter implements Filter {

    private static final Set<String> PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET = new HashSet<>();

    static {
        PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.add(".png");
        PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.add(".css");
        PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.add(".js");
        PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.add(".jpg");
        PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.add(".gif");
    }

    public void doFilter(ServletRequest req, ServletResponse resp, FilterChain chain) throws ServletException, IOException {

        // æ’é™¤æ‰é™æ€èµ„æºï¼Œå®ƒä»¬å’Œæ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œæ²¡æœ‰å…³ç³»
        // 1.ç»™è¯·æ±‚å’Œå“åº”å¯¹è±¡è½¬æ¢ç±»å‹
        HttpServletRequest request = (HttpServletRequest) req;
        HttpServletResponse response = (HttpServletResponse) resp;

        // 2.è·å–å½“å‰è¯·æ±‚çš„ServletPath
        String servletPath = request.getServletPath();

        // 3.æ£€æŸ¥servletPathä¸­æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«â€œ.â€
        if (servletPath.contains(".")) {

            int index = servletPath.lastIndexOf(".");

            String extensionName = servletPath.substring(index);

            if (PUBLIC_STATIC_RESOURCE_EXT_NAME_SET.contains(extensionName)) {
                chain.doFilter(request, response);

                return ;
            }
        }

        // æ‰§è¡Œäº‹åŠ¡æ“ä½œ
        // 1.è·å–æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        Connection connection = JDBCUtils.getConnection();

        // 2.ä½¿ç”¨try...catch...finallyå—ç®¡ç†äº‹åŠ¡
        try{

            // 3.å…³é—­äº‹åŠ¡çš„è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
            connection.setAutoCommit(false);

            // 4.å°è¯•æ‰§è¡Œç›®æ ‡ä»£ç 
            chain.doFilter(request, response);

            // 5.å¦‚æœä¸Šé¢çš„æ“ä½œæ²¡æœ‰æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
            connection.commit();

        }catch (Exception e){

            // 6.å¦‚æœä¸Šé¢çš„æ“ä½œæŠ›å‡ºäº†å¼‚å¸¸
            try {
                connection.rollback();
            } catch (SQLException e1) {
                e1.printStackTrace();
            }

            // 7.æ•è·åˆ°å¼‚å¸¸åï¼Œè·³è½¬åˆ°ä¸“é—¨çš„é¡µé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºæç¤ºæ¶ˆæ¯
            String message = e.getMessage();
            request.setAttribute("error", message);
            request.getRequestDispatcher("/ErrorServlet?method=showSystemError").forward(request, response);

        }finally {

            // 8.ä¸ç®¡å‰é¢æ“ä½œæ˜¯æˆåŠŸè¿˜æ˜¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œåˆ°è¿™é‡Œéƒ½è¦é‡Šæ”¾æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
            JDBCUtils.releaseConnection(connection);

        }

    }

    public void init(FilterConfig config) throws ServletException {}
    public void destroy() {}
}
